info.title: National Crime Victimization Survey (NCVS) API
info.description: The NCVS (National Crime Victimization Survey) RESTful API is a web service that provides criminal victimization data obtained annually from a nationally representative sample of about 79,800 households and 143,210 persons interviewed each year.

get.description: Returns a list of available datasets and data types they are available in.
Returns a description of the fields/columns used returned in the household data sets.
Returns the personal population of reported incidents.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format the data will be provided in.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year will limit the data to only values that occurred the given year.

get.description: Returns the household counts of reported incidents

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format the data will be provided in.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year will limit the data to only values that occurred the given year.

get.description: Returns a description of the fields/columns used returned in the personal data sets.
Returns the personal population of reported incidents.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format the data will be provided in.

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year will limit the data to only values that occurred the given year.
